name: The Running Typer
description:
Typing runner

This is my submission for the Bird Jam #1. My initial thoughts on an endless-runner meets typing-game crossover were too ambitious for the short time I could spend on it in the end. Take it as a proof-of-concept and excuse my really uninspired writing ... (at least the end features a really big reveal!)

Controls

You will need to remember a lot of keys for this game. Hit [SPACE] for convenient button-pressing ;)
